meteringCharges.description: Charges may vary, please contact us on 131 806 for specific metering charges.

fees.description: Connection fee (GST incl) for standard move in requests during business hours. Fees may vary. See Additional Fee Information for details.
Disconnection fee (GST incl) generally applies for any move-out request. Fees may vary. See Additional Fee Information for details.

electricityContract.terms: This offer is available to residential customers currently within the Evoenergy Electricity distribution zone with applicable network tariff. Please visit www.redenergy.com.au/terms for full T&Cs applicable to this offer. Solar Feed-In T&Cs can be found at www.redenergy.com.au/solar-feed-in-tariffs. All times are AEST, unless you have an interval meter, in which case daylight savings time will apply.
electricityContract.variation: We may vary our standing offer rates no more than once every six months. If we vary our rates, we will publish the variation in a newspaper and on our website at least 10 business days prior to the effective date. If we increase our rates, we will also provide you written notice of at least 10 business days prior to the variation. If we decrease our rates, we will provide you written notice of at least 5 business days prior to the variation.

demandCharges.description: Demand calculation is based on the maximum measured interval consumption occurring between the relevant dates from 5pm to 9pm Mon to Sun (incl public holidays). All times are AEST/AEDT. Applies per day on the maximum KW demand for all usage.

Demand calculation is based on the maximum measured interval consumption occurring between the relevant dates from 9pm to 9am Mon to Sun (incl public holidays). All times are AEST/AEDT. Applies per day on the maximum KW demand for all usage.

Demand calculation is based on the maximum measured interval consumption occurring between the relevant dates from 5pm to 9pm Mon to Sun (incl public holidays). All times are AEST/AEDT. Applies per day on the maximum KW demand for all usage.

Demand calculation is based on the maximum measured interval consumption occurring between the relevant dates from 9pm to 9am Mon to Sun (incl public holidays). All times are AEST/AEDT. Applies per day on the maximum KW demand for all usage.

singleRate.description: Controlled load 1 rates are available during times specified by your distributor

solarFeedInTariff.description: Red Energy FIT - GST included if any
Government contribution - Feed-in scheme 10 2009-2029 (GST incl if any)
Government contribution -Feed-in scheme 30 2010-2030 (GST incl if any)

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Your contract is ongoing until it is ended by you or us.
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: The fees and charges listed in the Fees and Charges section above apply to the standard move in and move out requests. For details on our additional fees and charges, please visit https://www.redenergy.com.au/additional-service-charges-act or contact us on 131 806.
